message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $11,500. It's a great deal for you, and I'm confident you'll find it valuable. Let me know what you think!
Hi Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,500. I'm willing to make a compromise, but I need to stay within my budget. Let me know if you can meet me halfway.

Bob, I understand your budget constraints. While I can't go down to $9,500, I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about $10,500? It's a fair price considering the value of the product. Let's see if we can make this work!
Hi Alice, I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to go up to $10,000, but no more. Can you meet me at this price?
